verbose_text: Compared with the rats with DM, the rat rod cell response a wave, b wave, maximum response b wave, photopic (photo)-ERG b wave and oscillatory potential (OP) p4 wave latency significantly decreased and the amplitude of OP Os1 wave increased significantly in the rats with DM treated with AIV for 11 weeks.
evidence: rod cell response a wave, b wave, maximum response b wave, photopic (photo)-ERG b wave and oscillatory potential (OP) p4 wave latency significantly decreased and the amplitude of OP Os1 wave increased significantly in the rats with DM
